titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn Wharf and Warehouse Co. private ledger 2016.032
titlestmt.author: Maggie Schreiner

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-25 13:53:19 +0000.

did.unittitle: Brooklyn Wharf and Warehouse Co. private ledger
did.abstract: The Brooklyn Wharf and Warehouse Co. was a New York corporation that was involved in the business of storage, wharfage, and warehousing, and owned property in Brooklyn. This collection includes one handwritten financial ledger.

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: The ledger contains handwritten entries accounting for a variety of financial occurrences, such as profit and losses, salaries, rents, and dredging from the period of approximately 1895-1900.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Brooklyn Wharf and Warehouse Co. was a New York corporation that was involved in the business of storage, wharfage, and warehousing, and owned property in Brooklyn stretching approximately 2 Â¼ miles along the waterfront from above the Brooklyn Bridge to the Erie Basin on Gowanus Bay.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Materials in this collection are in the public domain.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is available for use without restriction.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This ledger was found in the repository, with no accompaning information about provenance.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn Wharf and Warehouse Co. private ledger, 2016.032, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
